name: Homemade Chipotle Seasoning
description: In less than 5 minutes, you can make your own homemade chipotle seasoning! Use it to add smoky heat to all your favorite foods.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon ground chipotle chili pepper (can substitute any chili powder)
1 teaspoon ground chipotle pepper (or cayenne pepper)
instructions: Place all of the herbs in spices in a small bowl or jar, then stir or shake to combine.
